name: inner-cosmos
description: Personal website with Python code execution

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.prod: npm run build && concurrently "npm run prod:backend" "npm run prod:frontend"
scripts.prod:backend: cd backend && uv run python -m uvicorn main:app --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000
